stealthy_time.description: How long elapsed between two event state change to consider a stealthy status.

stealthy_show.description: How long an event remains in furtivity status before it changes again to another status.

bagot_freq.description: How many oscillation to be counted before event is put un bagot statement.

bagot_time.description: Duration to consider when computing bagot oscillation.

flapping_persistant_steps.description: Number of state changes step to keep in case of long term flapping. If some steps have to be cropped, most recent ones are kept.

restore_event.description: When true, consdider state change with different state level, otherwise consider a change at alert level.
